generalDescription.type: Module to visualize Fingrams for fuzzy association rules
generalDescription.objective: This module generates Fingrams, thus allowing the analysis of fuzzy association rules designed with KEEL.
generalDescription.howWork: This module generates the required configuration file to use an stand-alone open source software tool has been developed for creating fingrams (http://sourceforge.net/projects/fingrams/). This software produces Fingrams

parameterSpec.param: Rules Selection -> Minimum Lift: Minimum Lift of rules to be represented graphically.
Fingrams Generation -> Metric: Metric used to relate rule; undirected/symmetric metric or directed/asymmetric metric.
Fingrams Generation -> Blank Threshold: Blank threshold represents the minimum level of rule firing by a given example.
Fingrams Scaling -> Pathfinder Parameter Q: Q value used by Pathfinder to scale the network.
Fingrams Drawing -> Layout: Layout algorithm used; Kamada-Kawai or Fruchterman-Reingold.
